com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder

Class StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.tools.builder.StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    StrokeBuilder

    public static class StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder
extends Object
    Builds strokes in which every point on the stroked shape's line is stamped with a shape.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Transforms the last specified shape from a filled (solid) shape into a stroked shape that is stroked by the given stroke.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder withoutInterpolation()
      When invoked, the stroke shape will be "stamped" only at each point where two paths join.

        Parameters:
        sides - The number of sides of the polygon (i.e., 3 for a triangle, 8 for an octagon, etc.)
        sideLength - The length, in pixels, of each side.
        rotationDegrees - Degrees to rotate the orientation of the polygon

      • rotated

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder rotated(double degrees)
        Rotates the last-specified stroke shape by a given amount. Throws an exception if invoked prior to specifying a shape.
        Parameters:
        degrees - Number of degrees to rotate the shape.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • sheared

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder sheared(double xShear,
                                                double yShear)
        Shears (slants) the last-specified stroke shape. Throws an exception if invoked prior to specifying a shape.
        Parameters:
        xShear - The horizontal shear multiplier; 0 means no shear
        yShear - The vertical shear multiplier; 0 means no shear
        Returns:
        The builder

      • scaled

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder scaled(double xScale,
                                               double yScale)
        Scales (enlarges or reduces) the last-specified stroke shape. Throws an exception if invoked prior to specifying a shape.
        Parameters:
        xScale - The horizontal scale multiplier (1.0 means no scale)
        yScale - The vertical scale of the multiplier (1.0 means no scale)
        Returns:
        The builder

      • outlined

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder outlined(float width)
        Transforms the last specified stroke shape from a filled (solid) shape into an outlined shape.
        Parameters:
        width - The width, in pixels, of the outline
        Returns:
        The builder

      • stroked

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder stroked(Stroke stroke)
        Transforms the last specified shape from a filled (solid) shape into a stroked shape that is stroked by the given stroke. That is, this method produces a stroke from another stroke.

        It is advised not to stroke a stroke with a StampStroke, as doing so exponentially increases the drawing complexity of whatever shape is being stroked.

        Parameters:
        stroke - The stroke with which to stroke the current stroke.
        Returns:
        The builder.

      • withoutInterpolation

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder withoutInterpolation()
        When invoked, the stroke shape will be "stamped" only at each point where two paths join.
        Returns:
        The builder

      • interpolated

        public StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder interpolated(int resolution)

      • build

        public Stroke build()
        Creates the stroke as specified.
        Returns:
        The built stroke
